ComicInfo.Summary:
A military pilot from a radioactive, alternate future has arrived in Berlin 1945, and the corrupt officials from his world want him stopped. Though he won’t reveal the details of his mission, he’s made one thing clear: our entire reality is at stake.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Tula Lotay | 1 | Sub-A | Subscription Cover A | Butch Guice (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 2 | Sub-B | Subscription Cover B | James Biggie | 3 | RE | San Diego Comic-Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Butch Guice (a) & Diego Rodriguez (c) | 4 |
